creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
If the URI scheme was standardized a lot of functionality in the sitemaps in 
the
publications could be consolidated in the root sitemap and hence duplication
could be eliminated.


------- Additional Comments From Andreas Kuckartz 2003-02-28 23:15 -------

Roadmap says:
"Product Maturity: Standardize sitemaps"
for version 1.2
